lessons.japanese: 雨が降ったり雪が降ったりすると、私はいつもブーツを履きます。
lessons.indonesian: I always wear boots when it rains or snows.

lessons.japanese: 雨とか雪の時は、必ずブーツを履くんだ。
lessons.indonesian: I always wear boots when it rains or snows.

lessons.japanese: ブーツを買いたいんですけど。
lessons.indonesian: I would like to purchase some boots.

lessons.japanese: この新しいブーツでみんなの鼻を明かしてやりたいんだ。
lessons.indonesian: With these new boots of mine, I hope to knock them dead.

lessons.japanese: 彼女はブーツを一足買った。
lessons.indonesian: She bought a pair of boots.

lessons.japanese: 彼女のブーツは私のものよりずっと早くだめになる。
lessons.indonesian: Her boots wear out much more quickly than mine.

lessons.japanese: 彼はブーツの泥をこすり落とした。
lessons.indonesian: He scraped the mud off his boots.

lessons.japanese: 人々の一団はスノーブーツを履いて出発した。
lessons.indonesian: A group of people started off in snow boots.

lessons.japanese: 若者の間で狩猟用ブーツがはやった。
lessons.indonesian: It became popular among young people to wear hunting boots.

lessons.japanese: 私はブーツを１足買った。
lessons.indonesian: I bought a pair of boots.

lessons.japanese: 私はスキーのブーツを１足買いたい。
lessons.indonesian: I want to buy a pair of ski boots.

lessons.japanese: 雨が降ったり雪が降ったりすると、私はいつもブーツを履きます。
lessons.indonesian: I always wear boots when it rains or snows.

lessons.japanese: ブーツを買いたいんですけど。
lessons.indonesian: I would like to purchase some boots.
